DECLARATION BY PARENT/GUARDIAN OF APPLICANT

(To be made at a recognised court of law)

I _______________________ Parent/Guardian of _____________________________ who is a candidate for the SSC into the Nigerian Army DO SOLEMNLY AND SINCERELY DECLARE as follows:

  1. I am a citizen of the Federal Republic of Nigeria and hail from _______________ LGA of ________________ State.
  2. I agree that child/ward, upon invitation, shall attend the SSC Selection Board Interview.
  3. I shall not claim any compensation or other relief for any injury or death which may result in the course of tests/exercises conducted by the said SSC Selection Board.
  4. I shall not intefere with the training of my child/ward in whatsoever manner if he is selected by the SSC Selection Board.
  5. My Child/Ward and I shall not enter into any correspondence with the Nigerian Army on the outcome of the result of the SSC Selection Board.
  6. I understand that my Child/Ward will be subject to the provisions of the Armed Forces Decree (No. 105) as amended and I MAKE THIS SOLEMN DECLARATION CONSCIENTIOUSLY BELIEVING IT TO BE TRUE in accordance with the Oath Act of 1963.


Parent/Guardian Sign _____________________________________ Date ____________________


Swort at ______________________________ this ____ day of __________ 20 ____



Before Me ________________________________________
Name and Signature of Commisioner for Oaths
